data.title: Keynotes, Forecasts & Strategy
data.meta_description: Institute for Global Futures | Keynotes, Forecasts & Strategy
data.text:
MasterCard

“Your skillful weaving of societal, business, technological and payments industry trends gave my team much to think about. The breakout groups we held following your presentation were highly energized and productive as a result of the material you presented.”

--

Robert W. Selander President and CEO

Kraft

“Thank you so much for your contribution to Kraft’s Digital Hothouse event. It was a huge success, it’s getting terrific feedback from the business teams and your participation has made all the difference.”

--

The Kraft Digital Hothouse Team

Anthony Robbins Companies

“I want to personally thank you for joining our Platinum Partners in Alaska and delivering not only an interesting, but compelling speech for this group. The feedback has been phenomenal. Our Platinum Partners also appreciated you joining and personally interacting with each and every one on our Dog Sledding activity.”

--

Pauline Hailstones Event Manager

Federal Express

“I particularly liked the way you took a complex issue and managed to aim it at multiple levels of tech understanding in the audience and relate it to their varying perspectives.”

--

Toby Redshaw, Vice President

MetLife

“All of our guests, and our MetLife team, at the recent Customer Advisory board meeting thoroughly enjoyed your presentation. It was both timely and on point. You obviously understand the broad trends affecting the country, and what possible outcomes may result. We also appreciated just the right mix of wit and wisdom.”

--

Craig J. Guiffre, Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer

Qualcomm

“Your insights on the key trends and strategies that will shape the future of mobile business, on what consumers want, and on the wireless business models and technologies that will create opportunity for strategic advantage in the future were enlightening.”

--

Gina Lombardi, Senior Vice President

State Street Global Advisors

“You provided some though-provoking insight to global trends that are significantly impacting the future of business. After you left, the discussions throughout the rest of the day drew directly on the themes of your presentation.”

--

Otello Sturino, Chief Operating Officer

Age Wave

“Your presentation was terrific! During the twenty years that I have been a platform speaker, I have experienced very few individuals with the rare blend of genuine creativity, intelligence, and communications skills that you possess.”

--

Ken Dychtwald Ph.D., President & CEO

Hughes Network Systems

“I would highly recommend you to other corporations and events that might occur in the future. I feel that your presentation style and personality were fresh and very interesting to me and all attendees.”

--

Paul J. Latchford, Senior Director of Strategic Business

Computer Sciences Corporation

“We especially appreciate the way you customized your presentation to our specific businesses and markets. Your cutting edge multimedia presentation, expertise and obvious passion for the topic translated to an informative, entertaining and actionable presentation.”

--

Peter Blatman, Senior Vice President and Managing Partner

Blue Cross

“Your presentation was insightful, thoughtful and clear. Your ideas were fresh and gave the audience, all of whom have years of health care experience a new lens with which to see the challenges that face our industry. It was the real highlight of our conference.”

--

Debra Shepard, VP Marketing Consortium Health Plans

Insurance Education Association

“I wanted to express my deep appreciation for the superb job you did in setting the stage for the Cooperative of American Physicians and Mutual Protection Trust’s two day strategic planning session. During the following two days, we frequently referred back to some of the ideas you offered and these ideas were reflected in the output from our strategic planning activities.”

--

Richard A. Coskren, President and CEO

Health Benefits CalPERS

“We especially appreciated your presentation during our ‘Dynamics of the Health Care Marketplace…The Board Members and several attendees have commented that it was an excellent day of health care discussion and information sharing.”

--

Jarvio A. Grevious, Assistant Executive Officer

Consumer Bankers Association

“You have an excellent perspective on the Internet and the depth at which it is going to affect every aspect of our industry…Not only will we be inviting you to present again, we will highly recommend you to anyone who is looking for a practical and expansive view of the future technology will play in the corporate world.”

--

Joe Belew, President

Direct Marketing Association

“As we discussed on site, this audience was comprised of senior level executives from direct marketing companies around the country and around the world. They are not always the easiest group to please, but they were delighted with the insight you delivered in your presentation on technology and how it would impact their business.”

--

Dan Goldstein, Director, Conference Program Development

Education Assistance Corp

“Your session on Technofutures, and the session discussing the study ‘America’s Youth Look to the Future,’ which examined the attitudes, inspirations, and financial and academic preparedness of young people ages 16-24, were very helpful in raising the awareness of these very important issues.”

--

Clark J. Wold, President

Giga Information Group

“Your dynamic keynote did more than just set the tone of the conference. It propelled the audience into a state of m ind where they were receptive to the new and exciting technologies that would be demonstrated in the days to come…On top of everything, you were very pleasant to work with and accommodating to our needs.”

--

Genevra Newell, Event Marketing Specialist

KPMG

“It became apparent that the vast majority of the audience was very engaged in your presentation. This was not a major surprise to me, as the audience were primarily leaders in technology and your presentation touched upon many subjects near and dear to our hearts.”

--

Phil Weiss, Senior Manager, Information Risk Management

Mortgage Bankers Association of America

“It was a great pleasure to work with you and we appreciated all your hard work to put on such an outstanding presentation to our members, that truly represented a commitment to our programs and goals.”

--

Edward J. Callahan

NTCA

“I want to especially commend you on taking the time in advance of coming into our meeting in order to call me to discuss our group.”

--

Eleanor B. DeMoors, CMP Director of Meetings & Exhibits

Xerox

“As you know the times we live in are exciting and challenging. A person capable of captivating the essence of this fundamental shift is rare. You are such a person.”

--

Kevin Senior, Vice President & Chief Operating Officer

ABB Business Processes
